name: test_e2e_with_logs[019_SQLI_ADV_093]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_ADV_093` |
| **Name** | Blind SQLi with Subquery |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | advanced |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `1' AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users)>0--`
- **Encoded**: `1%27%20AND%20%28SELECT%20COUNT%28%2A%29%20FROM%20users%29%3E0--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~42000ms
- **Timestamp**: 20:31:28.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_ADV_093-1770841888903-ecgmrc pattern_id=SQLI_ADV_093 uri=/?q=1%27%20AND%20%28SELECT%20COUNT%28%2A%29%20FROM%20users%29%3E0-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_ADV_093-1770841888903-ecgmrc pattern_id=SQLI_ADV_093 uri=/?q=1%27%20AND%20%28SELECT%20COUNT%28%2A%29%20FROM%20users%29%3E0-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
